plugins.description: Control menu with rotary encoder & button
plugins.extendedDescription: Hardware rotary encoder with pin A connected to interrupt pin, and a button to select

plugins.description: Control menu with Up / Down / OK buttons
plugins.extendedDescription: Switches that represent up, down and OK controlled by switches library

plugins.description: LiquidCrystalIO display direct or other i2c
plugins.extendedDescription: General LiquidCrystal based display that can be used with Arduino pins (or any IO expander)

plugins.description: No display or custom display module
plugins.extendedDescription: This is for cases where either no local display, or a custom display is going to be used.
Render using the AdafruitGFX library. Set the graphics variable, rotation and screen size.
Use this option when you don't want any remote control capabilities
Use this option to be able to control the menu over many kinds of serial link, for example RS232, USBSerial, Bluetooth

plugins.description: Ethernet2 library control for Ethernet shields
plugins.extendedDescription: Use this option to be able to control the menu over many kinds of ethernet sheilds that are compatible with Ethernet2 library
